Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Room deals with all operations to do with the bookings held within the room. This includes adding, changing and deleting bookings, as well as printing out a list of bookings
    Author:
    Hayden Charles Smith, z3418003 Last modified: 20th April 2013

      Construct a Room object

    • Method Detail

      • attemptToAddBookings

        public boolean attemptToAddBookings(int desiredCapacity,
                           java.lang.String userName,
                           int numweeks,
                           int month,
                           int date,
                           int time,
                           int duration,
                           java.lang.String title)
        Attempts to add a booking to the room, and returns whether it was successful or not. To add a booking, it ensures the room has appropriate capacity, and that all requested new booking spaces are currently free.
        Parameters:
        desiredCapacity - Capacity required by booker
        userName - Name of booker
        numweeks - Number of repetitions over weeks for booking
        month - Month booking is in
        date - Date within month that booking is on
        time - 24 hour time of booking (hours)
        duration - Duration of booking (integer)
        title - Title of particular booking
        Returns:
        boolean whether booking attempt was successful

      • attemptToRemoveBookings

        public boolean attemptToRemoveBookings(java.lang.String userName,
                              int numweeks,
                              int month,
                              int date,
                              int time)
        Attempts to remove a booking from the room, and returns whether it was successful or not. To see whether booking is able to be removed, it checks if all booking parameters given by the user match every corresponding booking space
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of booker
        numweeks - Number of repetitions over weeks for booking
        month - Month booking is in
        date - Date within month booking is on
        time - 24 hour time of booking (hours)
        Returns:
        boolean whether booking removal was successful

      • attemptToChangeBookings

        public boolean attemptToChangeBookings(Room newRoom,
                              java.lang.String userName,
                              java.lang.String roomName,
                              int numweeks,
                              int monthOld,
                              int dateOld,
                              int timeOld,
                              int capacity,
                              int monthNew,
                              int dateNew,
                              int timeNew,
                              int durationNew,
                              java.lang.String title)
        Attempts to change a booking from one booking time to another, and returns whether it was successful or not. To see whether a booking can be changed, it ensures all old bookings currently exist, that all new booking spaces are free, and that the new room has appropriate capacity
        Parameters:
        newRoom -
        userName - Name of booker
        roomName - Name of current room
        numweeks - Number of weeks to change
        monthOld - Month current booking is in
        dateOld - Date within month current booking is on
        timeOld - 24 hour time current booking is on (hours)
        capacity - New capacity required by booker
        monthNew - Month new booking is in
        dateNew - Date within month new booking is on
        timeNew - 24 hour time new booking is on (hours)
        durationNew - Duration of new booking
        title - Title of new booking
        Returns:
        boolean whether booking change was successful
